hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
if [ -f "MCU_revision_info.txt" ]; then MCUrev=$(egrep 'Last Changed Rev:' MCU_revision_info.txt | sed 's:[^0-9]::g') else echo "Unable to find MCU revision info" exit 1 fi
if [ -d "MCU_trunk" ]; then svn up --ignore-externals -r $MCUrev MCU_trunk else svn co --ignore-externals https://svne1.access.nsn.com/isource/svnroot/LRC_SC_MCUHWAPI/HZSCM_TEST/trunk@$MCUrev MCU_trunk fi #svn export --force https://svne1.access.nokiasiemensnetworks.com/isource/svnroot/BTS_T_PS_TOOLS/CiTools/coverage_merge.py #svn export https://svne1.access.nsn.com/isource/svnroot/BTS_SC_MCUHWAPI/HZSCM_TEST/trunk/Tools/ctc2cob

svn export --force https://svne1.access.nsn.com/isource/svnroot/BTS_T_PS_TOOLS/CiTools/coverage_merge.py
#!/bin/bash
echo "--------------------------------------------------------" echo "-- UT REPORTS " echo "--------------------------------------------------------"
source /opt/ctc++/x86_64/7.3.1/interface/startup/linsee.env source /opt/python/x86_64/2.7.3/interface/startup/linsee.env
mv ut/HWR/ut_coverage.xml ut_hwr_copertura.xml #mv ut/om/lcp/ut_cobertura.xml ut_om_lcp_copertura.xml mv ut/om/lsp_axm/ut_cobertura.xml ut_om_lsp_axm_copertura.xml #mv ut/om/lcp/build/ctc_code_coverage.xml ut_om_lcp_copertura.xml #mv ut/om/lsp_axm/build/ctc_code_coverage.xml ut_om_lsp_axm_copertura.xml
echo "Making sources visible in coverage report..." sed -i ut_hwr_copertura.xml -e "s#filename=\"#filename=\"HWR\/#g" sed -i ut_hwr_copertura.xml -e "s#trunk/HWR#HWR#g"
sed -i ut_om_lsp_axm_copertura.xml -e "s#\/ephemeral.*\.\.\/HWR#HWR#g" sed -i ut_om_lsp_axm_copertura.xml -e "s#\/ephemeral.*\/HWR#HWR#g" sed -i ut_om_lsp_axm_copertura.xml -e "s#\/ephemeral.*\/ObjectModel#ObjectModel#g" sed -i ut_om_lsp_axm_copertura.xml -e "s#\/ephemeral.*\/UnitTest#UnitTest#g" sed -i ut_om_lsp_axm_copertura.xml -e "s#\/ephemeral.*\/CCS_Services#CCS_Services#g" sed -i ut_om_lsp_axm_copertura.xml -e "s#MCU_trunk\/##g" sed -i ut_om_lsp_axm_copertura.xml -e "s#\.ephemeral.*trunk\.##g"
#sed -i ut_om_lcp_copertura.xml -e "s#\/ephemeral.*\.\.\/HWR#HWR#g" #sed -i ut_om_lcp_copertura.xml -e "s#\/ephemeral.*\/HWR#HWR#g" #sed -i ut_om_lcp_copertura.xml -e "s#\/ephemeral.*\/ObjectModel#ObjectModel#g" #sed -i ut_om_lcp_copertura.xml -e "s#\/ephemeral.*\/UnitTest#UnitTest#g" #sed -i ut_om_lcp_copertura.xml -e "s#\/ephemeral.*\/CCS_Services#CCS_Services#g" #sed -i ut_om_lcp_copertura.xml -e "s#MCU_trunk\/##g" #sed -i ut_om_lcp_copertura.xml -e "s#\.ephemeral.*trunk\.##g"
sed -i ut_om_lsp_axm_copertura.xml -e "s#\/var\/fpwork.*\.\.\/HWR#HWR#g" sed -i ut_om_lsp_axm_copertura.xml -e "s#\/var\/fpwork.*\/HWR#HWR#g" sed -i ut_om_lsp_axm_copertura.xml -e "s#\/var\/fpwork.*\/ObjectModel#ObjectModel#g" sed -i ut_om_lsp_axm_copertura.xml -e "s#\/var\/fpwork.*\/UnitTest#UnitTest#g" sed -i ut_om_lsp_axm_copertura.xml -e "s#\/var\/fpwork.*\/CCS_Services#CCS_Services#g" sed -i ut_om_lsp_axm_copertura.xml -e "s#MCU_trunk\/##g" sed -i ut_om_lsp_axm_copertura.xml -e "s#\.var\/fpwork.*trunk\.##g"
#sed -i ut_om_lcp_copertura.xml -e "s#\/var\/fpwork.*\.\.\/HWR#HWR#g" #sed -i ut_om_lcp_copertura.xml -e "s#\/var\/fpwork.*\/HWR#HWR#g" #sed -i ut_om_lcp_copertura.xml -e "s#\/var\/fpwork.*\/ObjectModel#ObjectModel#g" #sed -i ut_om_lcp_copertura.xml -e "s#\/var\/fpwork.*\/UnitTest#UnitTest#g" #sed -i ut_om_lcp_copertura.xml -e "s#\/var\/fpwork.*\/CCS_Services#CCS_Services#g" #sed -i ut_om_lcp_copertura.xml -e "s#MCU_trunk\/##g" #sed -i ut_om_lcp_copertura.xml -e "s#\.var\/fpwork.*trunk\.##g"
s='ut_hwr_copertura.xml ' s+='ut_om_lsp_axm_copertura.xml ' #s+='ut_om_lcp_copertura.xml '
python coverage_merge.py $s -o ut_coverage_sonar.xml #ctcxmlmerge ut_om_lcp_copertura.xml ut_om_lsp_axm_copertura.xml -x ut_coverage_lrc_all.xml

#!/bin/bash
echo "--------------------------------------------------------" echo "--------------------------------------------------------" echo "-- MT REPORTS " echo "--------------------------------------------------------" echo "--------------------------------------------------------"
source /opt/ctc++/x86_64/7.3.1/interface/startup/linsee.env source /opt/python/x86_64/2.7.3/interface/startup/linsee.env
mv mt/LRC/HWR/mt_lrc_coverage.xml mt_hwr_copertura.xml
sed -i mt_hwr_copertura.xml -e "s#\.\.\.ObjectModel#ObjectModel#g" sed -i mt_hwr_copertura.xml -e "s#\.\./HWR/##g" sed -i mt_hwr_copertura.xml -e "s#\.\.\.HWR\.##g" sed -i mt_hwr_copertura.xml -e "s#\.\.\.ObjectModel#ObjectModel#g"
s='mt_hwr_copertura.xml ' #s+='ut_om_batch2_copertura.xml ' #s+='ut_om_batch3_copertura.xml '
python coverage_merge.py $s -o mt_coverage_sonar.xml
